subject: Economy
question_en: What is the role of the Reserve Bank of India in formulating monetary policy in India?
question_hi: राष्ट्रीय निवृत्ति को रिवाजी की प्रणाली का भूमिका किसी एक निवृत्तियां से कैसे करती हैं?
A_en: The RBI formulates monetary policy by studying various indicators.
A_hi: रिवाजी की प्रणाली करने में रिवाजी प्रौद्योगानी कैसे स्वतः करती है।
B_en: The RBI monitors the inflation rate, growth rate of GDP, and foreign exchange rates to formulate monetary policy.
B_hi: रिवाजी करने में राजनेवाली स्वतः बने विस्तृत्वाने में कैसे स्वतः करती है।
C_en: The RBI regulates the money supply in the economy through open market operations.
C_hi: रिवाजी करने में राजनेवाली स्वतः करने में
D_en: The RBI influences the interest rates in the economy to achieve its monetary goals.
E_en: The RBI regulates the credit expansion in the economy.
F_en: The RBI manages the balance of payments in India.
G_en: The RBI influences the inflation rate in India.
H_en: The RBI regulates the money supply in India.
I_en: The RBI controls the interest rates in India.
J_en: The RBI manages the exchange rates in India.
K_en: The RBI influences the trade balance in India.
